title: Panacea - The Documentary
abstract: video clips, talking heads, scenes of backstage friction and the technical problems of multimedia are intercut with a fragmentary reveal of the first public performance of PANACEA...
description: Panacea the Documentary follows the journey of Arena Theatre Company's creative team as they embark on an ambitious large scale perfromance event fusing modern technology and cinematic devices. We follow the journey of the team as they wrestle with combining conventional theatre and MTV culture.
related_objects: Collection; B1004014; PAML pilot project collection; Active; 01 Sep 2000-01 Dec 2000
